mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.record_id AS "recordId", a.student_id AS "studentId", a.name AS "name", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", rt.id AS "recordType.id", rt.name AS "recordType.name", s.id AS "student.id", s.name AS "student.name"
LEFT JOIN recordtype rt ON rt.id = a.record_id LEFT JOIN student s ON s.no = a.student_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO studentrecord( id, record_id, student_id, name, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{recordId}, #{studentId}, #{name}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE studentrecord SET record_id = #{recordId}, student_id = #{studentId}, name = #{name}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
